name: zendash
description: A library of common tool methods

scripts.publish: babel src/index.js --out-dir lib && terser lib/index.js --compress --mangle --output lib/index.js && nrm use npm && npm publish
scripts.build: babel src/index.js --out-dir lib && terser lib/index.js --compress --mangle --output lib/index.js
scripts.clean-npm-proxy: npm config delete proxy && npm config delete https-proxy

author: xuze <569552263@qq.com>
